metadata.title: Tuesday, 24th February, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to widen the Great North Road from Kapiri Mposhi to Nakonde;
(b)    if so, when the road works will commence; and
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is.
(a)    when the number of immigration officers at all border posts country-wide will be increased; and
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to curb illegal entry of foreigners into the country.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    what has caused the delay in constituting the District Health Management Team in Sikongo District; and
(b)    when the Team will be constituted.
(a)    when additional officers will be deployed to Nsumbu Police Station in Nsama District; and
(b)    what measures have been taken to facilitate police patrols on Lake Tanganyika in the District.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development whether the Government has any plans to connect power to the following in Solwezi West Parliamentary Constituency
parts: (d)    the private entrepreneurs along the Solwezi-Mwinilunga (T5) Road.

questions.minister: Minister of Health when St Paul’s Mission Hospital in Nchelenge District will be provided with furniture such as patient bedside lockers.

Minister of Local Government and Housing what measures the Government has taken to extend the Central Business District boundary to accommodate the Integrated Development Planning for Kapiri Mposhi District.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when a bridge across Namilangi River to service Chivuli Community in Kaoma Central Parliamentary Constituency will be constructed.

parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to construct local courts and staff housing units in the following areas in Serenje District:
(b)    if so, when the construction works will commence; and
(c)    what the estimated period of construction is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the construction of Maimwene road from Maimwene School to Landless Corner-Mumbwa road junction will be completed.
